name: diagrammatically

using a diagram (= a simple plan or drawing explaining something): She explained the whole problem diagrammatically. The programme can be diagrammatically represented as in figure 16. See

More examplesFewer examplesFlowcharts are used to show the processes diagrammatically.It is invariably better to provide material diagrammatically rather than in flowing prose.This sequence of events can be demonstrated diagrammatically.
